IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: To create a world where the incidence of failed abortions and the lives of survivors is openly discussed and accepted abortion survivors are openly discussed and accepted and survivors and their families are supported and healed.
IRS990.MissionDesc: To create a world where the incidence of failed abortions and the lives of survivors is openly discussed and accepted abortion survivors are openly discussed and accepted and survivors and their families are supported and healed.
IRS990.Desc: Healing program accomplishments include: first groups of graduates from Fall and Spring Healing community program's first annual retreat men's program's serving more male survivors specific welcome group for all survivors connecting to facilitate connectedness to programs and community

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: Community support: first annual healing community retreat. Added specific Community Engagement Coordinator who is a healed empowered and equipped abortion survivor from our programs to this specific program. Increased levels of community engagement and support--visible transformation.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: Education skill development internal programs and education and outreach external: Added an education coordinator. Nearly 10 graduates of speakers training and our first Empowered by Life speaking event launched these survivors publicly for the first time. These survivors are now filling a gap in the culture and pro-life movement with their voices helping us to fulfill our mission of survivors being seen and heard and every human seen as more than a choice.

OtherExpensesGrp.Desc: Bank charges, credit card processing and platform fees
